title: Lee Sin Lvl 2 Solo Dragon

embed.description: Runes - http://i.imgur.com/9rklIiR.jpg Masteries - http://i.imgur.com/KbosBjS.jpg ◦Previous Video - http://youtu.be/rAJQJNfr8yM ★Facebook - http://goo.gl/jaHPIv ★Buy Games or RP Cards - https://www.g2a.com/r/loleaks ★Check my Stream - http://www.twitch.tv/loleaks (づ｡◕‿‿◕｡)づ Join LoLeaks Army! ★Subscribe - http://goo.gl/FFh15C ►Twitter - https://twitter.com/LoLeaks

body: Doesn't really need an explanation. Nerf Lee Sin please.

replies.body: They nerfed Pantheon 'cause he did it at level 3. If they don't nerf Lee for doing it at level 2 that'ld be hypocritical.

> [{quoted}](name=Kowe The Ewok,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ehs6EKfY,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2014-12-21T14:41:04.012+0000)
>
> They nerfed Pantheon 'cause he did it at level 3. If they don't nerf Lee for doing it at level 2 that'ld be hypocritical.

Riot is so scared to nerf their precious Lee $in tough. Honestly, I just want that champion destroyed at this point. He's been a dominant jungler for too many seasons, would be nice to see other champions for a change.
They nerfed him because he could do it safely. Lee was always around 50-25% health. If anyone found him, he woulda been fucked.

From what I saw Panth wasn't exactly safe doing drag at level 2.  He was blocking every other dragon attack so he was still taking some serious damage leaving him around half health if the enemy jungler happened to walk by.
Maybe we saw different Panths, I never saw a single one, myself included, fall below 75% health. It took a while, sure, but he was never in any risk.

Well I don't play Panth so I'm not an expert.  I just saw those "Panth does dragon at level 2!" video's.  If he was indeed safer once the technique was refined then there may be some difference there.

Yes all Panth needed to do dragon lvl 2 was q and w and AS runes, but now they made it to where his passive doesn't block dragon so he will a good bit of damage all throughout the game if he solos it.  It wasn't so much they nerfed panth because of the dragon they changed the dragon attack to a be recognized as a spell instead of physical damage.

So how does Nocturne do, then with that change...?

I'm guessing not much better, considering the CD?
Can't speak for many other Champs I pretty much only play panth, and have never touched nocturne, so I couldn't tell you.
Actually Pantheon could do dragon at level 1 without taking any damage at all... SivHD even put up a video showing how to do it.
Ok, just looked that up.  Wow that is crazy.

Pantheon gets dragon at level 3? Nerf that shizz!

Lee Sin gets drag at level 2? WOAH LCSBIGPLAY SO SNEAKY WOAH
They nerfed pantheon because pantheon was broken even without being able to solo dragon at early levels.

Lee's sustain in the jungle is definitely above average considering W. To be honest this is only skewing things in his favor even further. We're at the point in the preseason we whack-a-moled the most obvious beneficiaries of the new jungle (fiddle/warwick) even despite their weaknesses (fid is slow and warwick is hard countered by CC + coordination). What weaknesses does Lee have...?
He really didn't have lifesteal in that video. Most champions can solo dragon using that build/runes/shit.

> [{quoted}](name=Tisio,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ehs6EKfY,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2014-12-21T06:25:29.188+0000)
>
> He really didn't have lifesteal in that video. Most champions can solo dragon using that build/runes/shit.

Lee has lifesteal on his W. In combination with his shield it helps keep healthy compared to most junglers.

His runes are very standard, except the CDR glyphs which are needed to pull this off. But against full AD compositions CDR glyphs are the most optimal choice anyways, and while missing MR hurts against teams with AP threats grabbing CDR is not a bad tradeoff.

His masteries sure are fk'd. However I could not resist testing this for myself. As I suspected his adaptation of the masteries are completely unnecessary. Using those runes and 9-21-0 masteries you can still level 2 drag the same way he did. I imagine 21-9-0 can work too but I went with defensive because most deep offensive tree masteries don't help on monsters.

Besides if you reread my previous post I was only talking about Lee in a very general sense. His jungle sustain is strong and it's keeping him very relevant while many other champs like Eve or Wukong just die in the new jungle. This level 2 drag kill only demonstrates it very well.
5 % really is nothing early game.
Enough to solo the dragon at level 2 it seems.

He has between 3% and 8% lifeteal and spellvamp in that vid, depending whether iron will is active.

I tried the same with Aatrox, didn't nearly work that well until level 5.
Did you have your red bar full?
Yes, but I think If i didnt take lifesteal mastery and I could have taken more AD for more heal.
Im not suprised Lee Sin can do drag at level 2. He is Lee Sin afterall.
Lee Sin, the Blind Monk
I had a olaf somehow kill drag at lvl 1 the other night
His W lifesteal with his passive AS would probably let him tank through it.
Incidently, Fidd, Nunu, WW, Yorick, Irelia, and Diana all can do. I honestly hope you don't want to nerf all of them as well (Well except for Irelia obviously).
But none of them have the insane mobility that Lee has. Also, his damage ratios are crazy high. Finally, they all have mana problems, which Lee doesn't have to deal with.
They have other things.
Yeah they have other things. But their other things aren't nearly as op as Lee's damage or mobility.
And it's not even the damage *or* mobility that's the problem, its his damage **and** mobility.

> Also, his damage ratios are crazy high

You're right, 90% BONUS AD. Which means he only does damage if he builds damage, And if he builds damage, he's going to die.

On the other hand, Fidd and Nunu have better cc, Nunu doesn't have mana problems, WW does more damage, Irelia is undisputed more OP than Lee, and Diana clears much much faster.

> [{quoted}](name=Narasimha,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ehs6EKfY,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2014-12-21T14:33:20.335+0000)
>
> You're right, 90% BONUS AD. Which means he only does damage if he builds damage, And if he builds damage, he's going to die.

It is 180% AD, why are you ignoring the second part of his Q?
Let alone that anyone who builds full damage is squishy and going to die.
This isn't Lee sin exclusive.

> 
> On the other hand, Fidd and Nunu have better cc, Nunu doesn't have mana problems, WW does more damage, Irelia is undisputed more OP than Lee, and Diana clears much much faster.

Nunu has a slow on his E, and a slow on his ult.
Lee sin has a aoe knockup with his ult, an aoe slow.  A gap closer to allow him to slap down that slow.
How the heck does Nunu have better CC exactly?

Fiddle's has an AOE silence and a fear, so pretty equal but he is squishy.
WW does more damage only if he builds damage, if he builds full tank, he does just as much damage as anyone else because he relies entirely on his AA's and Q to do damage. I won't bother churning out the math, but a full tank WW does less damage than a full tank Lee sin.

Irelia is not more OP than Lee, get off the crack.
Diana clears faster but not by much.


Edit: Furthermore, same argument was used for Pantheon, and they nerfed his clear speed and made dragon bypass shield. So...yeah..no. Nerf Lee sin. He needs it anyway.

Too bad they wont nerf him anyway.

Muh 50% health after the clear.

Riot are huge hypocrites when it comes to Lee

All these people talking about how OP someone is because they can solo Dragon at Level 1-3 when the videos they post all show it without any enemy players to stop them and make for an easy First Blood.

It's not even that he can solo drag that is a big problem, its that he is also one of the best gankers with insane mobility and early game damage as well as the ability so solo the dragon. It's just broken.

The problem is that he can just straight up take the dragon. Lots of champs can solo drag early, but they have to shield the attacks or something similar to take reduced damage. Lee's natural sustain and damage is so high he doesn't need more than his wimpy shield to take it so early. The problem isn't the early dragon, it's his damage, sustain, and mobility.
His build /runes/ masteries probably were solely made for doing that dragon. He probably wouldn't be able to solo in a normal game with normal runes/ masteries and a normal build.

he posted them under the video. Doesn't look very off to me.

As for the build: I rush armor on Aatrox too, to take drake, just not that early.
Well this'll never be changed.
nope. lee sin is balanced champ, underpowered imo.  pls buff lee rito. late game, he's horrible just horrible, buff pls!
Oh God, I know I shouldn't hope for things, but I really want a Lee nerf.  Please, let it happen!

Watch Riot ignore this, because they'd never nerf their favorite champion.
Let's nerf Irelia, instead!
They should just change the term "jungler" to "Lee Sin" and "jungle" to "Lee Sin's Forest."
lee sin's forest...forest....forest lee sin , forest lee , forest sin , FOREST SIN , FORESSIN .. FORSEN!!  FORSEN!!  http://goo.gl/aTHDW0  *did you call?*

When Pantheon can solo the dragon, they nerf him.  When Lee can solo the dragon?  They'll probably just buff the dragon.

Always dancing around nerfing Lee.
There are so many champs that can do this... and this is insanely inefficient  as a jungle path and super easy to counter

LEE CAN 1V1 DRAG?!
AT LVL 2?!?!?!
WTF SINCE WHEN U GUYS ARE FUCKING STUPID
it suck that panth cant 1 man dragon more but I don't trust about lee killing it at level 2

And I'm just stuck here wondering what runes and masteries this guy used... I also would like to see this done in a normal game or ranked with competent people, no jungler is going to go on his way without passing dragon before level 3. This is hardly relevant to why Lee Sin is op considering multiple other champions can solo dragon at 1 or 2.
